attr.title: Xenon Valkyrie
attr.desc: Xenon Valkyrie is a rogue-like with many RPG elements in which you will have to get to the deepest part of a moon and finish the plans of a wicked witch. You will be able to get many weapons randomly as you fight in a world that is created every time you play.
attr.inst:
Download the game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/573780/Xenon_Valkyrie/,
copy copy data.win, all .ogg and .ini files to /ports/xenonvalkyrie/gamedata
